name: Canva
comparison_points: Canva requires manual drag-and-drop for every guest; InviteFlow.ai is 100% automated.
Canva layouts are static; InviteFlow.ai layouts are code-first and auto-resize for any name length.
InviteFlow.ai renders 500 invites in 30 seconds, a task that takes hours in Canva.
Canva is great for one-offs, but fails at volume.

name: Paperless Post
comparison_points: InviteFlow.ai offers deeper personalization beyond just 'name' fields (e.g., custom CTA per guest).
InviteFlow.ai allows full export of PNGs for total distribution freedom (WhatsApp, Slack, Print).

Paperless Post locks you into their email delivery system; we give you the keys.

name: Adobe Express
comparison_points: Adobe is powerful but complex; InviteFlow.ai has zero learning curve for non-designers.
Requires significant configuration for batch jobs; we handle it out of the box.
InviteFlow.ai focuses purely on event logistics, Adobe is a generalist tool.

name: Evite
comparison_points: Evite templates are recognizable and often feel 'canned'.
Limited customization options compared to our code-first CSS engine.
InviteFlow.ai is ad-free and respects your data privacy.
